venue.address_2: west side of the Saco River at a paved parking lot near the Notchland Inn
venue.name: Notchland Davis Path Trailhead

item.description: Trailhead:Paved parking lot on the east side of US Route 302, 5.6 miles south of the Willey House Site.We will be hiking on the Davis Path in the Dry River Wildness.There is extensive views of Mt.Washington from the summit of Mt.Crawford.This is a moderate hike. 5 miles round trip,elevation gain 2100 feet,6 hours estimated time. Steve
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MT.CRAWFORD
